Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a light-brown pottery vessel, the interior is grooved and spotted with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a buff-coloured slip and remains of one line of red-painted cursive text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394831) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394831)
